description: Mysore city has more than half a dozen Cafe Coffee Day (CCD) outlets. The oldest one is at the Kalidasa road, above the Green Leaf Restaurant. Another one is located adjacent to Bombay Tiffanys on the Kanthraj Urs road.
address: Coffee Day, New Kantharaj Urs Road, Kuvempunagar || Inside Shree Ganesha Arcade, Kalidasa Road.
